DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect repeated-dose administration itraconazole pharmacokinetics TAK-272 , well effect repeated-dose administration TAK-272 pharmacokinetics digoxin midazolam healthy Japanese adult male .
DOC.brief_title: Drug-Drug Interaction Study Between TAK-272 Itraconazole , Digoxin Midazolam
DOC.detailed_description: In Cohort 1 , effect repeated-dose administration itraconazole pharmacokinetics TAK-272 evaluate compare participant receive TAK-272 alone receive TAK-272 combination itraconazole . In Cohort 2 , effect repeated-dose administration TAK-272 pharmacokinetics digoxin midazolam evaluate compare participant receive digoxin midazolam alone receive either drug combination TAK-272 .
